name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】一番星の推し[あなた]へ届ける⇒ 『LETTER☆彡』【#白上フブキ生誕祭2023】 [7995orE5Enc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Seiza ni naretara' (If I could become a constellation) by Shirakami Fubuki.
Transition scene as Fubuki walks across the stage and the lights change.
Performance of the song 'Utakata' (Bubble) by Shirakami Fubuki.

subtitles.original: 一つしかない星
subtitles.english: The one and only star

subtitles.original: 何億光年　離れたところから
subtitles.english: From hundreds of millions of light years away

subtitles.original: あんなに輝く
subtitles.english: Shining so brightly

subtitles.original: いいな　君は
subtitles.english: You're so lucky

subtitles.original: みんなから愛されて
subtitles.english: Being loved by everyone

subtitles.original: いいや　僕は
subtitles.english: Actually, I

subtitles.original: ずっと一人きりさ
subtitles.english: Have always been all alone

subtitles.original: 君と集まって　星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 星降る夜　一瞬の願い事
subtitles.english: A fleeting wish on a starry night

subtitles.original: きらめいて　ゆらめいて
subtitles.english: Sparkling, swaying

subtitles.original: 震えてるシグナル
subtitles.english: A trembling signal

subtitles.original: 君と集まって　星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 空見上げて　指を指されるような
subtitles.english: Like being pointed at while looking up at the sky

subtitles.original: つないだ線　解かないで
subtitles.english: Don't undo the lines we've connected

subtitles.original: 僕がどんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how dazzlingly I shine

subtitles.original: もうすぐ時計は８時
subtitles.english: The clock will soon strike eight

subtitles.original: 夜空に満天の星
subtitles.english: The night sky is full of stars

subtitles.original: 何億光年　離れたところにはもう
subtitles.english: In a place hundreds of millions of light years away

subtitles.original: ないかもしれない
subtitles.english: They might not even exist anymore

subtitles.original: 月が綺麗で　泣きそうになるのは
subtitles.english: The reason the beautiful moon makes me feel like crying

subtitles.original: いつの日か　別れが来るから
subtitles.english: Is because one day we'll have to say goodbye

subtitles.original: 君と集まって　星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 彗星みたい　流れるひとりごと
subtitles.english: My flowing soliloquy is like a comet

subtitles.original: 消えていく　残像は
subtitles.english: The fading afterimage

subtitles.original: 真夜中のプリズム
subtitles.english: Is a midnight prism

subtitles.original: 君と集まって　星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 切なる願い　誰かに届いたら
subtitles.english: If my earnest wish reached someone

subtitles.original: 変われるかな　夜の淵を
subtitles.english: I wonder if I could change, as if tracing

subtitles.original: なぞるような　こんな僕でも
subtitles.english: The edge of the night, even for someone like me

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方　僕らは出会ってしまった
subtitles.english: In the far distance, we ended up meeting each other

subtitles.original: カルマだから　何度も出会ってしまうよ
subtitles.english: Because it's karma, we'll keep meeting again and again

subtitles.original: 雲の隙間で
subtitles.english: In the gaps between the clouds

subtitles.original: 君と集まって　星座になれたら
subtitles.english: If I could gather with you and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 夜広げて　描こう絵空事
subtitles.english: Let's spread out the night and draw a pipe dream

subtitles.original: 暗闇を　照らすような
subtitles.english: Even if it's not a full moon

subtitles.original: 満月じゃなくたって
subtitles.english: That illuminates the darkness

subtitles.original: だから集まって　星座になりたい
subtitles.english: So I want to gather together and become a constellation

subtitles.original: 色とりどりの光　放つような
subtitles.english: Emitting lights of all sorts of colors

subtitles.original: つないだ線　解かないよ
subtitles.english: I won't undo the lines we've connected

subtitles.original: 君がどんなに眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how dazzling you are

subtitles.original: 泡沫
subtitles.english: Utakata (Bubble)

subtitles.original: 平凡すぎて　くだらない世界
subtitles.english: A world that's too ordinary and worthless

subtitles.original: 閉ざしてた　誰も信じずに
subtitles.english: I kept myself closed off, trusting no one

subtitles.original: こじ開けたんだ　君が突然に
subtitles.english: Then you suddenly pried it open

subtitles.original: あの眼差しが僕を救った
subtitles.english: That gaze of yours saved me

subtitles.original: 初めて触れる感情
subtitles.english: Emotions I'm feeling for the first time

subtitles.original: 消えないように　握りしめて
subtitles.english: I hold them tight so they won't fade away

subtitles.original: 繋ぐ心の声
subtitles.english: The voice of a heart that connects

subtitles.original: まだ見ぬ世界へと
subtitles.english: To a world yet unseen

subtitles.original: 瞳に映っている
subtitles.english: What's reflected in my eyes

subtitles.original: 眩しすぎる今が
subtitles.english: Is this moment that's too dazzling

subtitles.original: 嘘でも　構わない
subtitles.english: Even if it's a lie, I don't care

subtitles.original: 響き続けた声を辿って
subtitles.english: Following the voices that kept echoing

subtitles.original: いつしかここが　居場所になって
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, this place became where I belong
